reviews.review: C'mon, Really? It's Half-Life! What did you expect?! This is one of, if not the most influential FPS of all hugging time! Sure, it's dated but again, what did you really expect!?

Ahh yes 1999
Absolutely classic game. Recommend it to anyone looking for a Good FPS.

Half-Life

Despite being the first game in the series, and that means it being the least technologically advanced, it pulls off many things that games can't today. First off, Half-Life can capture a horror/action feel I haven't yet felt in a video game in my 10 years of gaming. Plus, the combat and ammo management makes every battle count, as one bullet can be the difference between life and death. You have many different types of enemies, some that even require you to meet certain requirements, such as turning on power and fuel, or blowing out the floor. You need to be smart to survive the disaster that has struck. The only problem is that if you have very little health going into the next part of the game, sometimes a required fall can kill you. Other than that, great game.

In conclusion:

9/10
Even though Half-Life is a bit dated, it's still a great game, a Steam library essential I would say.

I never played Half-Life until just recently, and I have to say that what everyone says is true about it. The game had fantastic action throughout, though the story was just a basic alien invasion kind of plot. I'd recommend this game to anyone who wants to sink a little time into shooting alien creatures or learning to b-hop.

A very good classic shooter, a great game that shocked people in 1998, changed the gaming industry. If you have the money i would recommend buying half life.

After completing this game, i'm appalled at how positive my experience was. For a game released in 1998, it sure kept my attention and made me want to keep playing. Some modern games struggle to keep me satisfied with quality content, but after nearly 21 years, Half-Life still holds up. Truly deserving of it's status as a revolutionary title, especially for the shooter genre.

This game has such an amazing story line and given the age of the have, it doesn't even look that bad. Some of the features like siding boxes really are a good reminder that video games 20 years ago were attempting to become more physics based, which is quite the opposite of modern games becoming more static. I highly recommend picking this up on a sale given that it's only a dollar and you will get loads of hours of fun out of it.

Gelmis gecmis en iyi oyun indirimde ek oyunlariyla(opposing force,blue shift)beraber 2 tlye dusuyor oynamaniz gereken oyunlardan biri.gordan freeman adli MIT'den mezun olmus sessiz bir karakteri kontrol ediyoruz.Oyunun basladigi gun gizemli biri tarafindan(g-man)getirilen bir kristalle deney yapilacaktir.Ancak deney duzgun islemez ve xen gezegenine bir kapi acilir.O kapidan gelen yaratiklar black mesayi istila eder.Yeter bu kadar Spoiler.
